title: Billerica North, moderate size, one person
posting_body: Billerica North - One mile from train station.
*IF YOU’RE SEEING THIS AD, THEN IT’S STILL FOR RENT*
Wood floors, NO Pets, NO Smoking/Vaping,
No Laundry Avail. & Tenant Shovels own snow.
Place for One car parking - off street.
RESPONSES MUST INCLUDE YOUR PHONE NUMBER & NAME.
*(I do Not respond to "Is This  Still Available?")
but perfect for One person who is quiet.
Hasn't been rented in some time, still getting organized.
This probably won't be a quick process.
Trying to save Everyone time (including myself) by being upfront.
Please be patient and don't flood me with emails.
I'm sure I'll be swamped anyways.
